name: metaphysically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the part of philosophy that is about understanding existence and knowledge: In our philosophy class, we are trying to metaphysically understand what reality is, whether there is a soul, and other concepts that can't be seen.metaphysically speaking Metaphysically speaking, his contribution to the sport was just as meaningful as that of his more successful contemporaries.
More examplesFewer examplesSome people believe that immortality as the perpetual existence of the same personal self is metaphysically impossible.I am single at the moment as I reorganize myself both metaphysically and financially.She laughed at all this talk of the metaphysically distant future.
